GSD.product_version: versions from v5.19 to before v6.1.13
GSD.description:
net: use a bounce buffer for copying skb->mark

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.13 by commit 863a7de987f02a901bf215509276a7de0370e0f9, it was introduced in version v5.19 by commit 6fd1d51cfa253b5ee7dae18d7cf1df830e9b6137. For more details please see the references link.
